name: PublishReportZ
helpMarkDown: Pipelines task that publishes HTML report files

inputs.name: tabName
inputs.label: Report tab name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the tab displayed in the report window

inputs.name: reportDir
inputs.label: HTML file or directory path
inputs.helpMarkDown: The HTML file or directory path for the file(s) to be published

inputs.name: useFilenameTabs
inputs.label: Use filenames as tab names
inputs.helpMarkDown: When using reports from a directory, use the filename as the tab header for each file.
